articles.description: A new detector to home in on the mystery of dark matter is getting closer to deployment.
articles.content:
A new detector to home in on the mystery of dark matter is getting closer to deployment.
At the University of Southampton in the UK, physicists are testing an apparatus that involves levitating shee… [+2926 chars]
